items.sentence: Civilization is now threatened by nuclear war.
My mother made us cheese sandwiches for lunch.
Without his glasses, Tom is as blind as a bat.
If we hurry, we'll probably get there on time.
I don't have very many friends here in Boston.
I've already seen all I want to see in Boston.
My maternal grandmother was born in Australia.
I don't know whether Tom has a brother or not.
I doubt that I can get Tom to do that for you.
Tom made Mary a potato casserole with chicken.
Thanks for lending me the money that I needed.
I'll be living in Boston with my grandparents.
You may borrow my bicycle anytime you want to.
Both boys got on their bicycles and rode away.
If only I had a map, I could show you the way.
I can't read what's written on the blackboard.
Have you ever accepted a ride from a stranger?
I have to go back to the hospital next Monday.
Tom stopped in the middle of the intersection.
I showed Tom the pictures I'd taken in Boston.
